src:
Nvidia presenetila z dvema novima grafičnima karticama

02 Nov 2019, 06:21

Podjetje Nvidia je uporabnike osebnih računalnikov prijetno presenetila s predstavitvijo dveh novih grafičnih kartic, in sicer GeForce GTX 1660 in GeForce GTX 1650. Obema grafičnima karticama je računalniški gigant dodal oznako Super, novinca pa se razlikujeta tako po specifikacijah kot po zmogljivosti. Grafični kartici bosta naprodaj v drugi polovici meseca novembra, namenjeni pa posta tudi nekoliko zahtevnejšim ljubiteljem iger.
Grafična kartica GeForce GTX 1660 Super ima za preračunavanje grafičnih vsebin na voljo 1.408 CUDA jeder frekvence 1.530 megahercev oziroma 1.785 megahercev v pohitrenem načinu delovanja. Za shranjevanje vmesnih izračunov je na voljo šest gigabajtov pomnilnika GDDR6, hitrost prenosa podatkov pa zanaša 14 gigabitov na sekundo. Novost naj bi bila po ocenah poznavalcev za do 20 odstotkov zmogljivejša v primerjavi z modelom GTX 1660.
Model GeForce GTX 1650 Super je znatno boljši v primerjavi s predhodnikom, saj ima za preračunavanje podatkov na voljo 1280 CUDA procesorjev frekvence 1.530 megahercev oziroma 1.725 megahercev v pohitrenem načinu delovanja. Tu je na voljo štiri gigabajte grafičnega pomnilnika GDDR5 s prepustnostjo 12 gigabitov na sekundo. Novost naj bi bila v povprečju do 40 odstotkov zmogljivejša v primerjavi z njeno predhodnico.
Grafični kartici GeForce GTX 1660 Super in GeForce GTX 1650 Super pri delovanju porabita nekoliko več električne moči v primerjavi s predhodniki, a kot že omenjeno ponujata tudi bistveno večjo zmogljivost, predvsem pa pri računalniških igrah ločljivosti 1.080p. Novo grafično kartico GeForce GTX 1660 Super je že mogoče kupiti v Združenih državah Amerike, in sicer za okoli preračunanih 200 evrov. Nekoliko manj zmogljiva GeForce GTX 1650 Super pa bo naprodaj od 22. novembra dalje, njena maloprodajna cena pa žal še ni bila razkrita.



Povezave: Nvidia
text:
Tin Smelter Seal, Babel Regional Police Guarantees to Support Investment
02 Nov 2019, 06:59 by Servio Maranda (Contributor), Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Pangkalpinang - Directorate of Special Criminal Investigation (Ditreskrimsus) Regional Police (Polda) of Bangka Belitung Islands ensures its commitment to continue to support the investment climate in Bangka Belitung. However, the police still prioritizes mining management and tin smelters that comply with the rules.
"I explain because some parties are questioning the existence of a number of smelters that are not active due to law enforcement. The National Police continues to support the investment climate in Bangka Belitung as long as businesses comply with the rules outlined," said Director of the Directorate of Bangka Belitung Police Chief Commissioner Indra Krismayadi to reporters in Pangkalpinang , Saturday, November 2, 2019.
Indra said, in the mining business, a number of adjustments were needed by the smelter that refers to the legislation, including the Budget Work Plan (RKAB) and other permits.
"That already has rules and must be owned by the company. When one of the items does not exist, the company cannot run its business. This is what happens here. There are items that are incomplete and not in accordance with procedures. Automatically he does not work anymore. tin governance is an enforcer of the rule of law, "he said.
According to Indra, improving tin mining governance in Bangka Belitung has positive implications because Bangka Belitung has become a role model for mineral mining governance in Indonesia.
"If we flashback to the past, before this good governance many private smelters were taxing. Now the state tax revenue from the mining sector is very large. Last year it reached Rp 750 billion. This year the state is targeted to reach Rp 1.5 trillion," Indra explain.
The Head of the Mineral Minerals Mining Division of the Bangka Belitung ESDM Service Amir Syahbana admitted that many smelter entrepreneurs were constrained in submitting the RKAB because they had to be verified by the Competent Person Indonesia (CPI).
Amir added, his party believed in the verification carried out by the Indonesian Competent Person although the mechanism of its performance in verifying backup data, exploration reports and resources was questioned by a number of parties.
"In the smelter's RKAB there is a substance related to the balance of reserve resources that must be recorded or verified by CPI. The rules are why CPI must be done because the government cannot verify the reserves report of IUP holders. Therefore, professional verification is requested," he said.
